SUBAI


ABOUT ME

Hello and welcome to my online portfolio, i'm a freelance pluridisciplinary graphic designer based in Dhaka, I design and illustrate web, print or motion projects for independant or major company looking for creative and efficient artworks.
I have worked on a range of different projects from identity and branding, print material to web design.
Here is my porfolio, so don't hesitate to let me know what you think.
Download My CV
